title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, April 21, 2022
description: Naturalist John Muir was born in Dunbar, Scotland, on this day in 1838. The founder of the Sierra Club was essential in protecting American wilderness areas.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Naturalist John Muir was born in Dunbar, Scotland, on this day in 1838. The founder of the Sierra Club was essential in protecting American wilderness areas.
